00031

00033   
00036   TriggerCheck(int main_word, int tolerance, int up, int down) {
00037     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , main_word  ) ;
00038     obj()->setIntVal( 1 , tolerance  ) ;
00039     obj()->setIntVal( 2 , up  ) ;
00040     obj()->setIntVal( 3 , down  ) ;
00041   }
00042

00049   
00050 
00052   int getMainWord()   { return obj()->getIntVal(0) ;  } 
00054   int getTolerance()   { return obj()->getIntVal(1) ;  } 
00056   int getUpSearch()   { return obj()->getIntVal(2) ;  } 
00058   int getDownSearch()   { return obj()->getIntVal(3) ;  }
